title: About
intro: Get to know me a little better. We can start here.

sections.heading: My journey
details: I obtained a Bachelor's degree in Business Finance and have built expereince in sales and customer service. I always had a passion for computers and being creative but couldn't make the most of it. Web development and design has become a passion that I want to expand and continue to explore.

Currently under the mentorship of Perpetual Education exploring my skills by experimenting in a wide range of coding and design disciplines. I see myself continuing to challenge myself, to learn, and to do amazing things.
When I'm not coding you'll catch me playing games, hitting the gym, and or checking out the latest music. I'm a little bit of foodie and looking for the next best meal!
